subject: Hypodermic Needles and Syringes
Olympic Games (2012)
Doping (Sports)
Tests (Drug Use)
Steroids
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee announced that it would ban athletes competing at the London Olympics from possessing needles without clearance.
snippet: The International Olympic Committee announced that it would ban athletes competing at the London Olympics from possessing needles without clearance.
